ref: 12505 śukti f. ʻ oyster shell ʼ Kauś. 2. śaukta -- ʻ made of mother -- of -- pearl ʼ Hcat., śauktika -- n. ʻ pearl ʼ lex.
Pa. kuruvindaka -- sutti -- f. ʻ a powder for rubbing on the body ʼ;
S. sutī f. ʻ oyster shell ʼ, sutiaṛo m. ʻ sea -- shell for keeping ointment in ʼ, suto m. ʻ a sort of sea -- shell ʼ;
Ku. sutiyo ʻ wooden vessel with several compartments for condiments ʼ;
Bi. situā, situhā, sut˚ ʻ scraper made of shell for removing clean layer of sugar in refinery ʼ;
Mth. situā ʻ blunt kind of shell for scraping out pots ʼ;
H. sutuī, sutuhī ʻ pearl oyster, oyster shell ʼ;
Si. sutu ʻ shell -- fish, oyster ʼ.
